1.title: The Social Scaffold
1.description: The foundation. Greetings, yes/no, respect toggles, basic existence and commands.

2.title: Domestic Defense
2.description: The Kitchen. Surviving meals, managing time, expressing internal states, and the art of hospitality.

3.title: Urban Survival
3.description: The Streets. Auto rickshaws, numbers, money, and spatial relationships.

4.title: The Debrief
4.description: Past tense. Reporting what happened with chronology, sequence, and logic connectors.

5.title: Kinship & Gossip
5.description: Family structure. Pronouns, reported speech, opinions, and the gossip protocol.

6.title: Operations (The Future)
6.description: Future tense. Planning, proposing, scheduling, and conditional logic.

7.title: Local Fluency (Attitude)
7.description: Sentence tags, intensifiers, fillers, speech compression. Sounding local, not textbook.

8.title: Deep Cover (Graduation)
8.description: Conflict resolution, humor, adverbs of manner, and full synthesis. The final level.

9.title: The Interrogator
9.description: The complete question toolkit. Missing question words, ability, permission, and obligation grammar.

10.title: The Emotional Radar
10.description: Feelings, emotions, likes and dislikes. Moving from physical states to emotional literacy.

11.title: The Adjective Arsenal
11.description: Descriptors. Size, quality, temperature, newness, comparison. The ability to describe anything you see.

12.title: The Morning Protocol
12.description: Daily routine. Wake up, bathe, dress, navigate the house, leave and return. The domestic verb layer.

13.title: Kitchen Commander
13.description: Cooking, cleaning, and commanding the kitchen. The domestic verb layer that makes you useful.

14.title: The Digital Connector
14.description: Phone calls, messaging, making plans, confirming and cancelling. Social connection through technology.

15.title: The Verb Engine: Action
15.description: Systematic verb paradigm training. Five high-frequency action verbs across all tenses, wrapped in scenarios.

16.title: The Verb Engine: Mind & Hand
16.description: Mental and physical verbs. Forget, learn, show, hit, let go. The verbs of cognition and physical interaction.

17.title: The Invisible Glue
17.description: Discourse markers, conjunctions, quantifiers. The words that make sentences flow instead of clunk.

18.title: The Chennai Clock
18.description: Weather, time of day, missing numbers, and clock time. Navigating the Chennai day by sun, rain, and schedule.

19.title: The Debater
19.description: Opinions, agreement, disagreement, and persuasion. The social skills that make you a participant, not a spectator.

20.title: The Decoder Ring
20.description: Movie comprehension layer. Demonstratives, commands, street slang, and emotional exclamations. The final key to understanding Tamil media.
